EmailTemplate.name: 17.Core.AirFrame.none.N.G.E.12204.AirFrame Network Planning.Email 3 - Nokia Clou
EmailTemplate.subject: Transform your telco network with Nokia
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Nokia Cloud wise services Build the perfect network with expert advice and services Whether you’re planning, deploying or operating your data center, Nokia has the services to help. With our telco expertise, we can help you model network capabilities, optimize your environment and speed up your innovation cycle. Discover our range of services.
Find out more:
- Data Center Services infographic <[[https://tools.ext.nokia.com/asset/200067]]>
- Nokia Data Center Services - The fast track from design to operations <[[https://tools.ext.nokia.com/asset/200499]]>
Contact me › <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2478.Contact-Us.html]]> Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
